hero.title: Hi, I'm Moran!
hero.subtitle: I'm a web developer passionate about clean code and beautiful UI.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a developer with strong analytical thinking and a clear system level perspective. I enjoy diving into complex problems, understanding how things connect, and delivering clean, reliable solutions. I work well in dynamic environments, collaborate naturally with others, and take ownership of the work I deliver.
about.description1: I’m a Full Stack Developer specializing in both front-end and back-end development. I build modern, responsive web applications with a focus on clean code, high performance, and great user experience.
about.description2: I love building beautiful, intuitive user interfaces, and creating seamless user experiences. I believe in clean code and good practices, and I'm always looking for ways to improve my skills and learn new technologies.
